All Classes

Class
Description
Bubble
The Bubble class handles everything with the Hero's special ability, named the bubble.
It extends MovingObject.
It begins at the Hero, and grows covering the whole screen.
BubbleUpdater
A subclass of GeneralLocationUpdater which extends it to illustrate the Bubble location updater.
This shows the STRATEGY, STATES and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
CeilingUnit
The CeilingUnit class creates ceiling units to be used for the world.
It extends MapObject.
A ceiling unit is a unit shaped like a square that is treated as a ceiling, with collision on all four sides.
Collision
An Interface which offers the colliding methods framework, since the objects in the game world all can collide with each other.
This shows the STRATEGY and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
CollisionBubble
A subclass of Collision which is used for Bubble to collide with others.
This shows the STRATEGY and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
CollisionCeilingUnit
A subclass of Collision which is used for CeilingUnit to collide with others.
This shows the STRATEGY and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
CollisionEnemy
A subclass of Collision which is used for Enemy to collide with others.
This shows the STRATEGY and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
CollisionFloorUnit
A subclass of Collision which is used for FloorUnit to collide with others.
This shows the STRATEGY and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
CollisionFruit
A subclass of Collision which is used for Fruit to collide with others.
This shows the STRATEGY and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
CollisionHero
A subclass of Collision which is used for Hero to collide with others.
This shows the STRATEGY and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
CollisionProjectile
A subclass of Collision which is used for Projectile to collide with others.
This shows the STRATEGY and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
CollisionScoreIndicator
A subclass of Collision which is used for ScoreIndicator to collide with others.
This shows the STRATEGY and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
CollisionWallUnit
A subclass of Collision which is used for WallUnit to collide with others.
This shows the STRATEGY and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
Controller
A superclass of the javafx controllers that includes some basic properities that is used by all controllers
ControllerFileReader
The ControllerFileReader facilitates the fetch of FXML and css File.
Demonstrates the FACADE and FACTORY Design Pattern.
Die
An Interface which offers the die method framework, to be utilized with the object that can die.
This shows the STRATEGY and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
ElementsAdder
This class is used to provide methods to add elements in the WorldElements.
Demonstrates Single Responsibility.
ElementsColliders
This class is used to provide methods to collide elements in the WorldElements.
Demonstrates Single Responsibility.
ElementsRemover
This class is used to provide methods to remove elements from the WorldElements.
Demonstrates Single Responsibility.
ElementsUpdater
This class is used to provide methods to update elements location from the WorldElements.
Demonstrates Single Responsibility.
Enemy
An Enemy is a non-controllable element which kills the Hero whenever it or its projectile comes in contact.
It extends MovingObject.
Enemies are able to be bubbled and free themselves from these bubbles after a period of time.
EnemyBubbledState
An Interface which offers the Bubbled state method framework for Enemy.
This shows the STATE and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
EnemyDie
A subclass of Die which is used for Enemy to die.
This shows the STRATEGY and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
EnemyIsBubbedState
A subclass of EnemyBubbledState which is used for Enemy to be in the state of bubbled.
This shows the STATE and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
EnemyJump
A subclass of Jump which is used for Enemy to jump.
This shows the STRATEGY and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
EnemyNotBubbledState
A subclass of EnemyBubbledState which is used for Enemy to be NOT in the state of bubbled.
This shows the STATE and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
EnemyUpdater
A subclass of GeneralLocationUpdater which extends it to illustrate the Enemy location updater.
This shows the STRATEGY, STATES and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
FileReader
This class includes some utilities that facilitate the usage of loading from external files.
Demonstrates Single Responsibility and FACTORY Design Pattern.
FloorUnit
The FloorUnit class creates floor units to be used for the world.
It extends MapObject.
A floor unit is a unit shaped like a square that is treated as a floor, with collision on the top, left, and right sides.
Fruit
The Fruit class handles how the fruit is created and interacts with the Hero.
It extends MovingObject.
The fruits are created after a bubble containing an Enemy is popped.
GameController
This class is extended from Controller.
This class utilize the GameRefresher to facilitate the rendering process.
Demonstrates the FACADE Design Pattern.
GameFinishController
This class is extended from Controller.
This class utilize the SaveScoreImageLoader to facilitate the rendering process.
Demonstrates the FACADE Design Pattern.
GameObject
An abstract class which is extended from the ObjectFeature,
this is intended to show the common features both a MapObject and a MovingObject have.
GamePageImageLoader
A class combined with multiple methods to facilitate the usage of the GameController
.
GameRefresher
The helper of the GameController to facilitate the rendering process of the game.
This realizes the FACADE Design Pattern as it provides a simple intro for the caller while in charge of the complicated tasks of decorating the rendered component.
GameScores
This class includes some utilities that facilitate the control of leader board names and scores, along with saving the current game scores.
Demonstrates Single Responsibility, SINGLETON and FACTORY Design Pattern.
GameStarter
This class is used to provide methods to read the files and start the game according to the level.
GameStatus
This class includes some utilities that facilitate saving the game status such as the level, difficulty, background choice, bubble color, player lives, total player lives and the total levels the game has.
GameUpdater
This class is used to call different methods from ElementsRemover, ElementsUpdater , ElementsColliders to update the location of GameObject from the WorldElements.
Demonstrates the FACADE Design Pattern.
GeneralLocationUpdater
A general location updater for all MovingObject, implements the interface LocationUpdater
This shows the STRATEGY, STATES and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
Hero
A Hero is an element that is controllable by the player.
It extends MovingObject.
Hero can shoot Projectile, shield from attacks, trigger a special attack and collect Fruit for points.
HeroChargeState
An Interface which offers the Charge state method framework for Hero.
This shows the STATE and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
HeroController
This class is used to deal with the key inputs bind from GameRefresher to control the Hero in WorldElements.
Demonstrates Single Responsibility.
HeroDie
A subclass of Die which is used for Hero to die.
This shows the STRATEGY and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
HeroInvincibleState
An Interface which offers the Invincible state method framework for Hero.
This shows the STATE and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
HeroIsInvincibleState
A subclass of HeroInvincibleState which is used for Hero to be in the state of invincible.
This shows the STATE and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
HeroIsReadyToChargeState
A subclass of HeroChargeState which is used for Hero to be in the state of ready to charge.
This shows the STATE and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
HeroIsShieldingState
A subclass of HeroShieldState which is used for Hero to be in the state of shielding.
This shows the STATE and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
HeroIsStunnedState
A subclass of HeroStunnedState which is used for Hero to be in the state of stunned.
This shows the STATE and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
HeroJump
A subclass of Jump which is used for Hero to jump.
This shows the STRATEGY and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
HeroNotInvincibleState
A subclass of HeroInvincibleState which is used for Hero to be in the state of NOT invincible.
This shows the STATE and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
HeroNotReadyToChargeState
A subclass of HeroChargeState which is used for Hero to be in the state of NOT ready to charge.
This shows the STATE and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
HeroNotShieldingState
A subclass of HeroShieldState which is used for Hero to be in the state of NOT shielding.
This shows the STATE and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
HeroNotStunnedState
A subclass of HeroStunnedState which is used for Hero to be in the state of NOT stunned.
This shows the STATE and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
HeroShieldState
An Interface which offers the Shielding state method framework for Hero.
This shows the STATE and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
HeroStunnedState
An Interface which offers the stunned state method framework for Hero.
This shows the STATE and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
HeroUpdater
A subclass of GeneralLocationUpdater which extends it to illustrate the Hero location updater.
This shows the STRATEGY, STATES and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
InfoController
This class is extended from Controller.
This class utilize the InfoPageImageLoader to facilitate the rendering process.
Demonstrates the FACADE Design Pattern.
InfoPageImageLoader
The helper of the InfoController to facilitate the rendering process of the info page.
Realizes Single Responsibility Principle and FACADE Design Pattern.
InteractableWorld
InteractableWorld includes the WorldElements and the bacis property of the game world such as friction, gravity, etc.
Jump
An Interface which offers the jump method framework, to be utilized with the object that can jump.
LeaderBoardController
This class is extended from Controller.
This class utilize the LeaderBoardImageLoader to facilitate the rendering process.
Demonstrates the FACADE Design Pattern.
LeaderBoardImageLoader
The helper of the LeaderBoardController to facilitate the rendering process of the info page.
Realizes Single Responsibility Principle and FACADE Design Pattern.
LevelStatus
This class includes some utilities that facilitate noting the game winning status such as win, lose and victory, along with some methods that provides to set the field.
LocationUpdater
An Interface which offers the location updating methods for the MovingObject.
This shows the STRATEGY, STATES and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
Main
Main provides an entrance to the game.
MainController
This class is extended from Controller.
This class utilize the MainPageImageLoader to facilitate the rendering process.
Demonstrates the FACADE Design Pattern.
MainPageImageLoader
The helper of the MainController to facilitate the rendering process of the main page.
Realizes Single Responsibility Principle and FACADE Design Pattern.
MapObject
An abstract class which is extended from the GameObject, this is intended for the objects that will not moving around within the game world (unlinke MovingObject).
MovingObject
An abstract class which is extended from the GameObject, this is intended for the objects that will be moving around within the game world (unlinke MapObject).
This class contains some ability that the moving objects will have like velocity, acceleration, direction, Die, Jump, these properties shows the Stragety Design pattern.
ObjectFeature
A superclass intended to show the basic feature of any object in the game.
PageImageLoader
The ImageLoader in charge of loading the external files, this is especially created to make the whole game modular so that the load of files will be facilitated and inspected at one place.
Realizes Single Responsibility Principle and FACADE Design Pattern.
PageImageLoaderUtilities
The ImageLoader facilitates the load of page images.
Demonstrates the FACADE Design Pattern.
Projectile
The Projectile class handles the projectiles being shot from a Hero or an Enemy.
It extends MovingObject.
The type of the projectile determines whether a Hero or an Enemy will be hurt, along with different property.
ProjectileUpdater
A subclass of GeneralLocationUpdater which extends it to illustrate the Projectile location updater.
This shows the STRATEGY, STATES and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
RenderObjects
The GameObject renderer which loads the images from external files and then render it on the screen.
Realizes Single Responsibility Principle and FACADE and FACTORY Design Pattern.
SaveScoreController
This class is extended from Controller.
This class utilize the SaveScoreImageLoader to facilitate the rendering process.
Demonstrates the FACADE Design Pattern.
SaveScoreImageLoader
The helper of the SaveScoreController to facilitate the rendering process of the save score page.
Realizes Single Responsibility Principle and FACADE Design Pattern.
ScoreIndicator
A ScoreIndicator is the indicator that appears when a Fruit is picked by the hero showing the score this fruit provides.
It extends MovingObject.
SettingsController
This class is extended from Controller.
This class utilize the SettingsPageImageLoader to facilitate the rendering process.
Demonstrates the FACADE Design Pattern.
SettingsPageImageLoader
The helper of the SettingsController to facilitate the rendering process of the settings page.
Realizes Single Responsibility Principle and FACADE Design Pattern.
SoundEffect
The Class handles the sound effect of the game and has been transferred to utilize the JAVAFX AudioClip.
WallUnit
The WallUnit class creates wall units to be used for the world.
It extends MapObject.
A wall unit is an unit shaped like a square that is treated as a wall.
WorldElements
WorldElements includes the GameObject type of different elements like CeilingUnit, FloorUnit, WallUnit, Enemy, Projectile, Fruit, GameObject, Bubble, ScoreIndicator in a ArrayList.
It also includes a Hero Object since the hero is only single in the game.
In addition, it also includes some helper like ElementsAdder, ElementsRemover.
